Comments_List: I really understood grammar much more and grasped addition speaking skills.

-increased Spanish speaking skills
-increased Spanish listening skills
- increased Spanish reading skills

This course provided an engaging environment for students, even those who dislike learning other languages in general (such as myself). The only weakness was that it didn't help with understanding spoken Spanish very much, since very few Spanish speakers speak as slowly as the teacher. However, this may have been a struggle for me specifically because none of my high school Spanish teachers ever spoke the language in class.
The course includes a lot of readings that could be exchanged with movies, but overall was very good.
I would recommend this course and the professor, was much easier than Spanish 2
